Title: Establishes "Junior's law"
Summary: Establishes "Junior's law" which requires a business with fifty employees or less to provide safe haven to endangered children and creates a "safe walk home zone" program between local boards of education and school boards and local chambers of commerce.
LawCode: Add Art 6 Title 8-B §§448-a & 448-b, Soc Serv L; amd §305, Ed L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the social services law and the education law, in relation to establishing Junior's law
